Create valuable connections

Connect to the trusted applications and ecosystem delivering synchronized finance

Create
valuable
connections

Connect to the trusted applications and ecosystem delivering synchronized finance

Get started with privacy-first tokenized assets and applications to unlock profitability, optimize capital and safely participate in institutional crypto markets.

The public L1 with privacy

Join the leading network chosen for regulatory grade tokenized real-world assets with ~$4T TVL, including $1.5T+ per month in tokenized UST repo.

DeFi innovation. TradFi control.

Use diverse tokenized assets and new forms of collateral across exchanges and applications with privacy.

Connect your way

Connect to multiple applications and assets from a validator. Run it yourself or access via a service provider, and with full flexibility over custodial arrangements.

Connect on Canton

 

From banking and capital markets to insurance and mortgage markets, applications on the Canton Network are delivering the promise of institutional grade digital assets, synchronized systems, and secure, permissioned data sharing.

Connect with regulatory grade tokenization, asset servicing, securities financing, structured product, and fund services solutions on the network. Tap into regulatory grade real-world assets ranging from tokenized securities to yield-bearing cash equivalents and stablecoins. Or bring your assets to the Canton ecosystem with out of the box solutions.

Discover the ecosystem

Start your Canton journey

The easiest way to get started is to spin up a validator node. Whether self-hosted, or through an integrated node or custody service provider on the network, running a validator allows you to tap into institutional-grade applications and privacy enabled digital assets live on the Canton Network.

 

01

Why run a validator?

Discover the role and value of accessing a node on the Canton Network

02

How to deploy your validator 

Find out the requirements and options for deploying a node on the Canton Network

03

Confidential collateral: privacy in action

Privacy is key to unlocking greater institutional digital asset adoption and utility across capital markets. Find out why in this article


04

Request access today

Contact an ecosystem partner or speak to a community expert today

 

“What particularly stands out for us, and for many of our clients, is the privacy of your assets and transactions when using Canton, which can be crucial for trading use cases. The setup allows us to reduce counterparty and settlement risks and optimize capital efficiency without sacrificing privacy. Furthermore, USYC is fully composable on the Canton Network, so participants can create additional utility around USYC by including it in their trading, cash, and risk management workflows”


Leo Mizuhara
Founder and CEO, Hashnote

“Building on the capital efficiencies and cost savings our solution is already bringing participants, connectivity with the broader Canton tokenization ecosystem can play an important role in driving the liquidity that supports the continued adoption of this emerging digital infrastructure for capital markets.”


Horacio Barakat
Head of Digital Innovation Capital Markets, GM of DLT Repo Platform, Broadridge

“As we deliver on our goal of a single source of truth for the industry, the Canton Network showcased how our platform could play within the wider capital markets ecosystem to unlock settlement efficiencies and greater collateral mobility. Key to this is Canton’s ability to deliver both the unified ledger, but also the granular controls we need as an app operator, and the privacy demanded by our customers”


Gary Klahr
Director of Strategic Initiatives, EquiLend 1Source

“What particularly stands out for us, and for many of our clients, is the privacy of your assets and transactions when using Canton, which can be crucial for trading use cases.
